source_caption_data.pre_caption: This abstract video opens with a central, vertical, curving red tube. A small, dark, teardrop-shaped object is positioned on the upper-right side of this tube and moves downwards. The scene then cuts to a wider view of a red, cavernous space, where a pool of yellow liquid fills the bottom of the frame. An unseen object strikes the liquid from the top center, causing several light-yellow fragments to splash upwards into the middle of the frame before they descend back into the pool. The camera remains stationary and at a straight-on angle in both views.
